div.head: 丹石毒痢
div.div: free-flux illness from cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: free-flux illness from cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning

sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, brought forth by an accumulation of heat poison following the intake of dan shi 丹石 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百 病主治藥 quoting Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 猯：主服丹石勞熱患赤白痢 , “It controls exhaustion heat with suffering from red and white free-flux illness resulting from the consumption of dan shi ”, writes 丹石毒痢 , “Free-flux illness from cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning ”.
